title: pinky1234
author: pinky1234
content: Title say it all , Open dime Releasing Soon Beautiful TapSigner Cards .  These cards are Beautiful , First Edition . Watch out.SATSCARD is new type of OPENDIME® in an NFC card form factor with ten times the reuse capacity.Gift and trade Bitcoin physically; maximize in person trading while minimizing trust between parties.What do you guys think !! https://coinkite.cards/

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC

comments.body: Quote from: pinky1234 on August 06, 2022, 03:59:06 PMBatch one its available to buy.  https://store.coinkite.com/store/opendime I did order the ones that were available - Tapsigner(1st edition) and SatsCard versions - 1st edition, cryptograffiti, sketchnote, nogood, moon HB, hotel key, Lucky HB, Neon HB, red envelopethere were a few that still showed as "coming soon" when my order was placed.
